医学新闻来自 News-Medical.Net - 来自世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-GB
新方法通过大脑情绪反应检测帕金森病堪培拉大学和科威特科学技术学院的联合研究小组通过分析大脑对观看视频剪辑或图像等情绪情况的反应，以近乎完美的精度实现了对帕金森病的突破性检测。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241216/New-method-detects-Parkinsons-disease-through-emotional-brain-responses.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241216/New-method-detects-Parkinsons-disease-through-emotional-brain-responses.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=c08f1878-acf2-46db-83c3-945bebb9e31b Mon, 16 Dec 2024 11:19:59 -0500 New method detects Parkinson's disease through emotional brain responses
科学家创建血液测试以提高癌症治疗效果皇家墨尔本理工大学和多尔蒂研究所的科学家开发了一种新的血液测试，可以筛查癌症患者，帮助他们的治疗更安全、更有效。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241216/Scientists-create-blood-test-to-enhance-cancer-treatment-effectness.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241216/Scientists-create-blood-test-to-enhance-cancer-treatment- effectiveness.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=b55f8ecf-7474-4d9c-a42c-675d71bb3472 Mon, 16 Dec 2024 11:12:22 -0500 Scientists create blood test to enhance cancer treatment effectiveness
纽约大学朗格尼 IBD 中心庆祝改变生活两周年炎症性肠病 (IBD) 是一种复杂、慢性且使人衰弱的疾病，影响着大约 300 万美国人，其中包括克罗恩病和溃疡性结肠炎患者。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241216/NYU-Langone-IBD-Center-celebrates-two-years-of-transforming-lives.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241216/NYU-Langone-IBD-Center-celebrates-two-years-of-transforming-lives.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=068ca7d9-9a29-48db-845b-14e615808ad5 Mon, 16 Dec 2024 10:55:59 -0500 NYU Langone IBD Center celebrates two years of transforming lives
酵母蛋白有望成为日常产品中的天然乳化剂提到乳化剂，很多人可能不知道它们的用途，但它们存在于从食品到化妆品的许多日常产品中。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241216/Yeast- Proteins-show-promise-as-natural-emulsifiers-in-daily-products.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241216/Yeast- Proteins-show-promise-as-natural-emulsifiers-in-daily-products.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=99f5d652-b275-44bb-8c16-c072e7b2b520 Mon, 16 Dec 2024 10:50:00 -0500 Yeast proteins show promise as natural emulsifiers in daily products
父母依靠威胁来解决幼儿的不当行为一项全国民意调查显示，当幼儿的行为变得具有挑战性时，许多父母会诉诸威胁——从拿走玩具到威胁圣诞老人会跳过他们的家。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241216/Parents-rely-on-threats-to-address-young-childrens-misbehavior.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241216/Parents-rely-on-threats-to-address-young-childrens-misbehavior.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=740397e9-c499-41ec-ad72-87714e4e47b4 Mon, 16 Dec 2024 10:45:52 -0500 Parents rely on threats to address young children's misbehavior
每一滴的精确度：汉密尔顿注射器技术的内部NewsMedical 与 Hamilton Company 讨论了其注射器技术、定制注射器解决方案以及多行业使用的注射器配件。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241216/Precision-in-every-drop-Inside-Hamiltone28099s-syringe-technology.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241216/Precision-in-every-drop-Inside-Hamiltone28099s-syringe-technology.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=b0fbd45e-9c20-4d8a-b6ae-56c262d28f1a Mon, 16 Dec 2024 10:04:00 -0500 Precision in every drop: Inside Hamilton’s syringe technology

Fairjourney Biologics 成立科学顾问委员会FairJourney Biologics SA 是抗体发现和优化领域的领导者，今天宣布成立科学顾问委员会 (SAB)，以支持其持续增长和创新的战略。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241216/Fairjourney-Biologics-builtes-scientific-advisory-board.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241216/Fairjourney-Biologics-builtes-scientific-advisory-board.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=bd4ad24e-3e8c-4ba0-9016-7ff07c2e360b Mon, 16 Dec 2024 07:29:00 -0500 Fairjourney Biologics establishes Scientific Advisory Board
分娩期间的剖腹产与未来怀孕的风险有关研究将分娩期间的剖腹产与复发性早产和妊娠中期流产的风险增加联系起来，凸显了宫颈损伤的担忧。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241216/Cesarean-deliveries-during-labor-linked-to-risks-in-future-pregnancies.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241216/Cesarean-deliveries-during-labor-linked-to-risks-in-future-pregnancies.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=93396a6b-1482-4c44-9851-732d0d9632aa Mon, 16 Dec 2024 07:24:00 -0500 Cesarean deliveries during labor linked to risks in future pregnancies
